title: Spacious and Convenient 2BR 2BA! Available on 8/12/2022!
posting_body: ['Convenient, Beautiful and Relaxing Gated Apartments Community', 'Property Address', '2557 Alvin Ave.', '| San Jose, CA 95121', 'Available: 8/12/2022', 'Offered By', 'Woodside Apartments |', 'show contact info', 'Description', 'WOODSIDE APARTMENTS is a beautiful apartment community located in the city of San Jose.', 'These updated apartment homes feature:', '-  Oven and range with hood', '-  Dishwasher', '-  Refrigerator', '-  New garbage disposal', '-  Air conditioning/ heater', '-  New wood flooring on selected floorplan', '-  Private patios and balconies', '-  Includes 2 parking spaces', 'The Community features:', '-  Pretty landscaped courtyard', '-  Swimming pool with lounge area', '-  Laundry facilities on-site with new machines', '-  Gated parking', '-  Convenient location near grocery stores, banks, post office, restaurants and a shopping mall', '-   Easy access to freeways 101, 880, 680', 'Deposit: $1500 on approved credit', 'Please call', 'show contact info', ', or visit <URL>, or click this link:  <URL>', 'AVAILABLE NOW!', 'Amenities', 'Balcony/Patio', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 2BD/2.0BA', 'Square Feet: 850', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $2,900.00', 'Available: 8/12/2022', 'Application Fee: $53.00', 'Security Deposit: $1,500.00 on approved credit', 'Images might be different in actual.']
